### Government Public Notice: Request for Proposal W0125-22WR24/A

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

#### Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

This notice for a Request for Proposal (RFP) is a call for qualified suppliers to participate in the procurement process to provide services for the Department of National Defence's requirement for Basic Flight Engineer Course (BFEC) training. The proposed services will include on-site ground school instruction for new Flight Engineer students who have not yet specialized on a specific operational airframe.

**Services Required:**
- Deliver on-site ground school instruction to new Flight Engineer students
- Services to take place at 426 (T) Squadron, located in 8 Wing, Canadian Forces Base Trenton, Ontario
- Two (2) Intermediate Instructors required for the duration of the project

**Project Timeline:**
- Project duration: January 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024
- Option to extend the contract by two (2) 1-year periods

**Security Requirements:**
- Bidders must hold a valid organization security clearance
- Proposed individuals requiring access to classified information must meet the necessary security requirements
- Bidders must provide the name of all individuals requiring access to classified information

**Notice: COVID-19 Pandemic**
- Temporary measures are in place to encourage social distancing at the Ontario Region Bid Receiving Unit
- Bidders must submit proposals electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application

**Submission Requirements:**
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
- Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted
- Bidders must submit their proposals through the epost Connect application

**Additional Information:**
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
- The learning services arrangement for this project is administered by the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) under the Learning Services Supply Arrangement (LSSA)

**Bidder Contact Information:**
- David Barltrop
- Email: [David.Barltrop@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:David.Barltrop@pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Telephone: (613) 328-1650

**Bid Closing Date:** September 12, 2022 at 14:00:00
